Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: How we doing out there?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: " -- if not for the courage of the fearless crew -- "

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Can we use our indoor voice please...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: You trying to make me feel guilty?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Guilty will be the least of what you feel when I run my rig into one of these god damn no name islands! Get me well here!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: All better...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: If I told you once...I told you a thousand times...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Finnegan this is as mean a pile of shit as we ever carried...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You remember the first time we met Finnegan? I think you were just starting out...smuggling gold off Sumatra for those two Chinese...what did we use to call them?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Fok Yu and Fok Yu Two...are we strolling down memory lane for any particular reason?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: No, it just struck me as odd...I don't see you for all these years and you've still got the same tape stuck in the box.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You know what they say...the classics are eternal.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: So where are we?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Right here...middle of nowhere...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: And where is our point of arrival?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Right here...middle of nowhere...and the answer to your question is yes.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Which question is that?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: The one you came up to ask...are we on schedule?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Take note Mr. Mason...this is why you hire a professional...No whining. No excuses.

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: I've heard a lot of stories about you mate...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: All of them flattering I'm sure.

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: They were...but they musta been talking about another Finnegan... because the one I heard about was as rough as they came...the one I'm looking at is, well, about as current as the music.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Don't mind him Finnegan...you remember 25...balls of steel... splashing around in a sea of testosterone.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I don't mind him...but I do think it's time for him to get back down below with the rest of the playgroup.

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: And who's gonna make me?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: The Finnegan you heard about.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: That's why we're sill around Finnegan...you and me... Nothing gets the feathers up. Business is business. Eh?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: And the classics are eternal.

Speaker: old woman
Dialogue: He said an orchid and a beautiful woman belonged together... It was our first date.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: He sounds like a real gentleman.

Speaker: old woman
Dialogue: The best of the best he was... This cruise was supposed to be our 60th anniversary gift to each other. He died last Spring...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I'm so sorry...

Speaker: old woman
Dialogue: I was going to wear one...special for him...like a memory...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Because an orchid and a beautiful woman belong together.

Speaker: crowd
Dialogue: Forever!! Here! Here!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Is it true what they say about a captain and his boat.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Is what true madame?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Madamoiselle...that the bigger the boat...the bigger the man...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: It is a theory I would be glad to put to the test.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: In school, the Sisters said testing was my specialty.

Speaker: passenger
Dialogue: Captain...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Enchante...

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: You wanted to see me Captain?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: We have a storm rising behind us... we may have to close the canopy, I hope it doesn't ruin your party.

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Ruin my party? Captain, this ship was built to withstand a typhoon. I can't imagine there's anything on the sea today that could possibly ruin my party.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Finnegan...Finnegan...

Speaker: leila
Dialogue: Gum kwa she bam dok.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: It's not noise...it's genius...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: You know what my goal is? Before I die I want to make love to a woman from every country on earth.

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: You mean countries that are acknowledged by the UN...or like made up countries too?

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: What the hell does that mean?

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Like Mamooli's country...

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: What you talkin'? Samoa's a county!

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: It's a dot on a map...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Map...no map...I don't give a shit ...they got women on Samoa, it's on the list.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Mr. Billy you're in the batter's box.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: At home we denosy the nosy.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: We're not savage here Mr. Billy... we're professionals. Hold him...Mr. Chin...

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: I'll take a go and the I vote we throw the little weasel overboard...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: I vote we slit his throat THEN throw him overboard...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: ...this is not a democracy. You don't get a vote.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: This isn't right Finnegan. I've got a contract.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: 20 hours on the clock. Out and back. Double for overtime.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: And no questions asked.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Who asked any?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: He did...with a crowbar...you know the rules on a broken contract.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I know it...but you want to get where you want to get, and back? I need a chief engineer, and unless you got a replacement, I'd highly recommend overlooking the indiscretion.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Thanks...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You put me in that position again I'll throw you overboard myself.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Retiring.

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Well you can still proceed with your plans then...in prison...Captain... escort the lady...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Mademoiselle...you are not a lady.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: And you...Monsieur...you are not a gentleman.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Here's what I think...I think these mokes below are a hit squad.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I saw these guy perform...at Altmont ...you know that? They opened for the Stones...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Right now...there's some bozo sitting on his yacht at those coordinates they gave us, sipping his scotch and soda...totally unawares that we are about to deliver 500 kgs of high power torpedo to light up his ass...that's what's down there in that hold and who knows what the hell else...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Hold still now...I was like three rows back.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: You don't give a shit about anything do you?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Sure I do...I give a shit that at 0300 hour we reach our point of destination. I give a shit that those mojos got to do what they got to do, and 45 minutes later we are turn around and gone. I give a shit that by the time the sun comes up we are all safely tucked in bed.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: That's it? That's all you give a shit about?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Oh yeah...and that my stitch job doesn't make you uglier than you already are...this won't hurt a bit...

Speaker: mate
Dialogue: The entire bridge electrical system is shutting down sir!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Switch over to auxiliary power, and run a circuit check.

Speaker: mate
Dialogue: Yes sir...

Speaker: first mate
Dialogue: Communications systems are out sir!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: What the hell is going on?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Communication systems have failed! Radar...sonar...radios...I don't understand it.

Speaker: mate
Dialogue: Maybe it's the storm!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Nonsense! We're impervious to weather!

Speaker: fist mate
Dialogue: We have a main frame meltdown!!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Well unmelt it!!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen...your attention please... Ladies and gentlemen...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Remain calm! Stop! Do you hear?

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Dear God.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Leila see what they're up to...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey!! Talk to me!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Jezebel's dead...Hercules is right behind her! We got a gusher in the hull!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Shit!!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: What did you do to my kids!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Me??

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: No! The man in the moon!! Who's driving this thing?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: What happened?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: We ran into a speedboat...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: How soon can we get up and running?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: We can't...we got one engine dead, and the other limping badly.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: I have a schedule...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: I spent two years building these things...screw your schedule!

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: You little weasel!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: We were talking about my schedule...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You're going to have to get a new one.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Not an option.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Then you better start swimming.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: One more joke and your comedy career is over. Now fix this.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: With what? Look at them...they need gears...cylinder heads...oil pans... we're in the middle of the goddamn ocean...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I think he knows that Joey.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Good! So maybe he also know where the hell am I going to get the parts I need...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Target in sight!!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Contact verified! You know the drill gentlemen!

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Lines set.

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: Tow lines!

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Clear!

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: Tow line secure.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Secure the zone of operation!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Great woman your mother. Real foresight.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: And she could do a hell of a barbie to boot! Belt up. You'll find all the parts you need up there.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I assume somebody up there has made sure no distress signal can be sent.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: I'd say that's a pretty good assumption.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: You know the crew could be armed.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: With what? Martinis and tanning oil?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Synchronize watches...

Speaker: leila
Dialogue: Kwan bat! Kwam bat! Booom!!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Yeah...yeah...yeah...

Speaker: leila
Dialogue: Asshole...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: You'd think they'd set a deck watch...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: I thought the plan was we'd evacuate them after we got through.

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Maybe plans changed...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Plans don't change...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Maybe it's the wrong ship.

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Shut up!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Let's just keep going.

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: You ain't giving the orders here!

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: What the...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Focus on the task Mr. Chin...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: What the hell is going on?

Speaker: electronic voice
Dialogue: Next stop, Chinatown!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Guys!! Whoa! WHOA! WHOA! WHOOOAAA!!

Speaker: electronic voice
Dialogue: Next stop, Fisherman's Wharf.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Your boys just killed a trolley car Red One.

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: We been down three decks, there's nobody home... Total spooky-town. Advise on how to proceed.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Stay to the schedule. Stay to the plan. Nothing has changed.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Hello?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: You know what I'm gonna do after this...I'm gonna get a normal life...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: ...Like a house in the suburbs... maybe a couple of kids...some sort of business...be in the bowling league...go to the ball games...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey...it's okay...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: What? You don't think I can have a normal life?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey...look at me...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Okay...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: What the...???

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Finnegan...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: It's okay...come on...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: I'm stuck...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Hey! What are you trying to pull!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: John...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Relax your arms...slowly...that's it...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: What the...

Speaker: leila
Dialogue: Gebop!!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: No shit I'll keep my eyes open.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: The hulls of these things are supposed to be impregnable...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: So?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: So...If the hull's impregnable why are my feet wet?

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Why don't you just stop figuring and keep working so we can get the hell out of here?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Why don't you help us so we can get done faster so we can get the hell out of here?

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: 'Cause grease monkey ain't in my job description dick head...

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: What I want to know is why the goddamn ocean is always cold...since I'm a kid I hate god damn cold water.

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: What was that?

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Nothing.

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Someone's back there.

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Hey! Come out here!

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Check it out!

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Hey! You hear me? Come out! Still no response.

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Will you check it the hell out!!

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: Man this shit is cold!

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: What is it man?

Speaker: vivo
Dialogue: I'm looking...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Vivo!! Vivo!!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Don't shoot, man, don't shoot!

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: What happened to Vivo?! What the hell happened to Vivo?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Helloooo?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I'm sorry... This area is for authorized personnel only. As the assistant to the Purser, I'm afraid I'll have to ask you to vacate...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Where is everybody?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: I mean...where is everybody?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Poolside?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You tell it straight or I pull the trigger. Who are you?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: A passenger...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Where are the other passengers?

Speaker: mason
Dialogue: Forget her...let's get what we came for and get the hell out of here!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Mulligan?? What?? I can't hear you?? Repeat I...

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Oh my God. I didn't mean to...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Stand down soldier!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: I didn't mean to! I though it was one of them!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: One of who?!

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Hanover!...Hanover! Come in! Come in you son-of-a-bitch!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Forget them...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Shut up! You hear me!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: ...we gotta get outta here -- NOW.

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: Shut up, man, just shut the hell up! I gotta think! I gotta think!!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: What's there to think about?? That THING back there...

Speaker: mulligan
Dialogue: There ain't no thing here!! No thing!! There's you him and me!! Got it! You him and...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Grab the parts!!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: This is Red one! Come in Red two!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: It's them! We've got to get off!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Let's find them!

Speaker: chin
Dialogue: What about the vault?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: It's not going anywhere...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Finnegan, what the hell was that?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I don't know...you got what we need?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: If I don't, I ain't going back to get it...you think we're safe?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Come on!!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Up!! I want to go up!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: OWWW!! OOWWW!!!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I'm not staying here!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: It ain't any better out there!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Now look what you did!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I saved your life is what I did!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Who asked you to!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: What the hell's going on here?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You're with that other bunch, right?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: What other bunch?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: The thieves.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I'm not a thief.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Then who are you?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I'm their ride.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You have a boat?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Finnegan!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: It's up there!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Not anymore.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Where are my men?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Dead.

Speaker: chin
Dialogue: YAAHHH!!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Drop it!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Nowhere...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Hanover, listen...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Shut up!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I told you...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Man, there's something here! On the boat!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: You see? You see?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Shut up! Shut up all of you! Now here's what we're doing... Mamooli is going to take you back to fix your engines, Chin and I are staying here to finish the job...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Did you clear this?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: With who?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: With that...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: It's gonna snap the cable!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Open! Open! God damn it!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Help me!!

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: 4th floor. 3rd floor. 2nd floor. 1st floor...

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: It's taking us to the bottom of the ship!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: HANG ON!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Where are we?

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: The sublevel lobby.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Don't touch it!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You shoot me and you got no ride home...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: How do we get out of here?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: We have to make it to the third deck...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Oh no!! Oh no!! Finnegan!!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: This way!

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Hey you! Muscles! Out here!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: We've gotta call for help.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Yeah man, no shit, call in the Marines.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: We can't...all the communication systems went down.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: So get them back up.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: I don't know how.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Hey I can fix any damn thing... where's the comm. center?

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: We should get off as soon as possible.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: But if we can at least send a message...

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: I say we evacuate as soon as...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Who are you?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: He's the owner...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Why don't you want a message sent?

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: I just think that...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Because you know a message can't be sent...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Bravo.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: How the hell do we fix it?!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: You can't... All the systems were melted at their core by nitric acid...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: This was your life's work...your dreams...

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: My dreams cost more than they would make...I miscalculated the market... there was no way I could recoup...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Unless you collected on the insurance...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: What are you people talking about?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: He's with them.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: All these people dead!! Because you screwed up on the math??

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: It's not going to help us!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: We're going to die here! We're going to die!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I was born in a City housing project in the Bronx OK? It's not in the cards that I die on a luxury cruise ship...now which way up?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You hear that?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: They are...they are everywhere.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: All right, be cool, everybody, nice and slow, no sudden moves.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: AHHH!!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Noooo!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Jesus Christ lady...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: What are those things?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I don't know...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Hey! Hey! Where are you going?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: ...there's got to be a way to access out back there...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: But what makes you think there aren't more of hose...things...back there?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Nothing...you want to come, come... you don't...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You don't have to be so touchy.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Look lady, I know you people are used to getting your way...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: What's that supposed to mean? You people.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You people...rich people...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I'm not rich people.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Well, you sure do a good imitation.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Thank you, I work at it...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Finnegan...John J...now that we've been properly introduced, can we get the hell out of here?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: So this boat of yours...that's what you do? Give people...rides.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: That's what I do.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Seen a lot of islands?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Quite a few.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Since I'm a kid, I had this dream... I want to own my own tropical island... Beaches, warm ocean, lots of food, little clothes...population of one...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Anti social?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Self sufficient...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: With the emphasis on SELF, and in selfish, right?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Takes one to know one.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Shoot it! Shoot it!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I don't know where it is!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: On the side!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: The safety...the safety... He flicks the safety on and off.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Hey! I didn't have to come back.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Yeah you did...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Right... You have a boat.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Boat or no boat... You woulda come back anyway. You're that kind of gal.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Oh yeah? What kind is that?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: The "come back" kind.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: How do you know that?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Takes one to know one.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Help me!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Grab his hands!!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: CANTON!! HELP!!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Where is the closest hatch?

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: I never meant for anyone to get hurt ...it was supposed to be clean...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You hypocritical bastard...all you gave a shit about was the money... where's the hatch!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey... Which way's aft?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: That way.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Who gives a shit about aft?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: That's where my boat's moored.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You trying to take over my show Finnegan, that what you trying to do?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Just trying to get to my boat...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You stay away from that vault! You hear me?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: They respond to sound...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: He made sense.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: He's a bloody...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Very good Finnegan...very good.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: What's on the far side?

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: I don't know.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: It's your damn ship! What the hell do you mean you don't know?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey, what difference does it make...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: How do we know you're going to signal...how do we know you're not going to just take off?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I'll wait here... You go check it out.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Finnegan...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Stop pacing.

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: AAAAHHHH!!!!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You deaf?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Why don't you back off?

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You want some too?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: How brave we are.

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: Hanover!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Fire!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You O.K.?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Finders keepers.

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: Where's Chin?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Gone...

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: This is not real! This is not bloody real!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Through there...another sixty, seventy yards...there are more elevators there.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: I ain't goin' up no more elevators.

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: There's stairways...

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: I say we stay right here!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Are you crazy?

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: There's plenty of food here. We can hold out...someone'll rescue us...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Who?

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: Someone...maybe they sent an SOS!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: On what? This son of a bitch  zapped the communications.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Mamooli stand down!

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: We don't even know if his boat is still there...you saw Billy!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Boat or no boat...I'm going...

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: They're wipin' us out one at a time. I say we make a stand. Right here! Right now! Maximum firepower!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Somebody shoot this jerk!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Nobody's shooting nobody...come on, just let us through the hatch!

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: I'll kill you!! I'll fucking kill you!! I'll do it! I'll do it! I'm not playin' around here!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I once saw a guy put a fish in a bottle, then he corked it, sealing it tight, and threw it to a baby octopus. The little sucker felt its way around that bottle, and in less than two minutes, got that cork off, slid inside, and ate that fish.

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: What the hell are you talking about?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Us...I'm talking about us... We're the fish.

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: And what? These things are octopuses

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I don't know what these things are ...all I know is...

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: What...? What??

Speaker: mamooli
Dialogue: EEEYYYAAAHHHH!!!!!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: What the hell is going on!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: They're herding us.

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: What are you talking about?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Like cattle...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You're saying they can think?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I'm saying they're calling the shots...

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Do we have to go there?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: What's the matter?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: The quiet...

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Maybe we lost them.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Or maybe we're exactly where they want us to be.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: A meat locker.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: We can't just leave them here.

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: I can.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Oh no...oh God please no.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: We can't do anything for them... Let's go...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: NOOO!!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Finnegan, No!!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Eat this.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Looking good...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You should talk...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: GO! GO! GO!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: We're going to sink! We've got to get on deck!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: So how do you get from the Bronx to the South China sea?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You quit high school, lie about your age, join the navy, and next thing you know, four years are up and you need a way to make a living...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Too small!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Gimme one! Gimme one!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: You idiot!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Oh my God, it's going to sink.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I was so goddamn close, Finnegan! So goddamn close to my island... I could almost taste the sand...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Keep tasting...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: They're catchin' up! They're catchin' up! We gotta slow 'em down!

Speaker: hanover
Dialogue: Feed them. That'll slow them down.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Feed 'em?!! Okay! All right! Feed 'em what? WHAT ARE WE GONNA FEED

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: EEEEEYYYYYAAAAHHHH!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: It's OK...it's not one of them... it's from the aquarium...it's...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You know what kind of force it took to rip open the bow of this ship? A million little things like this...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: ...even you don't deserve this.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Will somebody give me a break here?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Wait! Stop!

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: I'd like to but I have an appointment with my insurance broker!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You son of a bitch!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Look!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Oh my god! Oh my god! How do we do it? How do we get there?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Not like him.

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: Oh we sail the ocean blue, and our mighty ship's a beauty. We are strong men, yes it's true, and responsive to our duty...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Hit it! Hit it!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You know, Finnegan, I'm starting to believe what you said about you not being born to die on a luxury liner.

Speaker: canton
Dialogue: No! No! No!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Finnegan...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Yeah...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: ...the minute you start your engines ...it's going to kill us, isn't it?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Not unless we kill it first.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: If you blow up your boat, how are we going to get to the island?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Jet ski...there's one left up there.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Don't shoot!! Don't shoot!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Just the man I wanted to see. On this puppy here, you remember if it's red to blue or blue to red...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Not even a Joey, I'm glad to see you? Joey, what happened to your leg?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey, you want to get sucked out by a giant fucking mutated squid?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Red cross over to blue double blue ...is that what it is? A squid?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Squid...squid like...squid type... it's got tentacles, a feed sac... probably one central nervous processor somewhere...what the hell do I know is going on deep down in the ocean...there's all sorts of shit we've never seen...eighty foot clams...60 foot sharks...I'm just guessing...can you get me more juice out of Hercules...fast?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: For juice, I gotta rebuild. That's not fast.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: How about noise? Can you get noise? We don't need speed, just noise, right?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Right...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Can somebody tell me what the object of the exercise is here?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Seafood salad.  You ever operate a jet ski?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: You want ME to go up there?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Not unless you can wire a missile or fix an engine.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: And what if I run into one of those things?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Don't forget the safety.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Don't take too long...I'm not planning on being on the menu tonight.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: I've never seen you so congenial with a member of the opposite sex... The two of you got a nice patter going...got a nice rapport...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: And you got 10 minutes before this thing livens up a boring evening.

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I'm going to be OK...I'm going to be

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: You know what I think? I think our luck has just about run shit out...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: A little to the left...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: I think we gotta stop floating from one fucked up situation to the next...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Line it up now, nice and easy...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: I'm telling you, man, we got to give the future some serious thought.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I have been.

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: And what have you come up with?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: How does an island sound to you?

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: I gerry-rigged the ignition...all you gotta do is start her up...it won't go fast but it'll go loud...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: One whistle... Start the engine...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: She's gone...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Second whistle you make it to the deck and get ready to jump...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: All you're gonna do is get yourself killed...and for what? Some chick?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You're beautiful what you're jealous, you know that, Joey?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: NOOO!! NOOOO!! HELPP!! HELPP!!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Finnegan!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Don't look!! Push!!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: FINNEEGGGAANNN!!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Grab my hands!!

Speaker: both
Dialogue: YYYEEEAAAHHH!!!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Go! Go! Go!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Get to the jet ski! Go!

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Get a good look...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: FINNEGAN!! COME ON!!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Oh my God, oh my God.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: I don't mean to drop in unannounced ...you ready...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Soon as I get over the heart attack...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Three minutes...I'm not back...no matter what...you go...

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: No...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: You don't take orders very well, do you?

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: I don't take orders at all.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: This time, make an exception.

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Pantucci!... JOEY!

Speaker: trillian
Dialogue: Where's you friend?

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: He's not coming...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Was it the water in my eyes or were you guys about to...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Because it's cool, you know, I can always take a walk or something down the beach...

Speaker: finnegan
Dialogue: Joey...

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: Or I could go for a swim...although, I gotta tell you...if I never get in the water again...

Speaker: both
Dialogue: Joey!!

Speaker: pantucci
Dialogue: OK...OK...you don't have to beg me ...I'll stick around...
